welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nouadhibou, the bustling port city of Mauritania known for its stunning coastal views and vibrant local markets. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring the city and experiencing all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Marbella
restaurants.description: Marbella is a restaurant located in Nouadibou.

restaurants.name: Atlas Restaurant
restaurants.description: Atlas Restaurant is a kebab restaurant located in Nouadhibou.

restaurants.name: Cafeteria Le Bon Choix Nouadhibou Dubai Mauritania
restaurants.description: Cafeteria Le Bon Choix Nouadhibou Dubai Mauritania is a cafeteria located in Nouadhibou.

restaurants.name: Cafeteria Le Bon Choix Nouadhibou Dubai
restaurants.description: Cafeteria Le Bon Choix Nouadhibou Dubai is a cafeteria located in the city.

restaurants.name: Savana Cafe
restaurants.description: Savana Cafe is a bistro located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nouadhibou Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nouadhibou Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
